Control sub-commands
EMAC LLD Module API » EMAC LLD IOCTL Macros

EMAC_IOCTL_INTERFACE_MAC_CTRL sub-commands

The following macros are sub-commands that to be used when issueing emac_ioctl with EMAC_IOCTL_CMD set to EMAC_IOCTL_INTERFACE_MAC_CTRL

#define EMAC_IOCTL_INTERFACE_MAC_ADD   ((uint32_t)1U)
 

Detailed Description

Macro Definition Documentation

#define EMAC_IOCTL_INTERFACE_MAC_ADD   ((uint32_t)1U)

Enable UC flooding
